==How it works==
Triggering an [[/event.md|event]] on an [[/element.md|element]], also triggers the event on its parents (up the [[/element tree.md|element tree]]) and its children (down the [[/element tree.md|element tree]])

{| class="wikitable"
|'''Example'''
|
|'''Handlers which will get triggered'''
|-
|triggerEvent( "eventName", root)
|[[/Image:Event_source_root.png.md|Image:Event_source_root.png]]
|
addEventHandler( "eventName", root )<br/>
addEventHandler( "eventName", resourceRoot ) '''*In any resource*'''<br/>
addEventHandler( "eventName", anyPlayerElement )<br/>
addEventHandler( "eventName", anyVehicleElement )<br/>
'''source is root'''<br/>
|-
|triggerEvent( "eventName", myPlayerElement )
|[[/Image:Event_source_player.png.md|Image:Event_source_player.png]]
|
addEventHandler( "eventName", root )<br/>
addEventHandler( "eventName", myPlayerElement )<br/>
'''source is myPlayerElement'''
|-
|triggerEvent( "eventName", resourceRoot)
|[[/Image:Event_source_resource.png.md|Image:Event_source_resource.png]]
|
addEventHandler( "eventName", root )<br/>
addEventHandler( "eventName", resourceRoot ) '''*Only in same resource*'''<br/>
addEventHandler( "eventName", aVehicleElement )<br/>
'''source is resourceRoot of the calling resource'''<br/>
|-
|triggerEvent( "eventName", myVehicleElement)
|[[/Image:Event_source_mapelement.png.md|Image:Event_source_mapelement.png]]
|
addEventHandler( "eventName", root )<br/>
addEventHandler( "eventName", resourceRoot ) '''*Only in resource vehicle was created in*'''<br/>
addEventHandler( "eventName", myVehicleElement )<br/>
'''source is myVehicleElement'''<br/>
|}
